name: No Adventure, No Fun
description:
No Adventure, No Fun
This game is for LowRezJam2020

Simple escape game that the player have been trapped in the dungeon. All you have to do is escape from the dungeon.

TIPS:

  1.  W,A,S,D to move.
  2. Get the green orb.
  3. Place it in the box.
  4. The Door will open.
  5. Avoid from the spinning blade

Sounds - freesound.org

This is my first low resolution game with 16x16 assets. No Hate, Thank You.
